Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
Ontology Specification. Formalize CQs
Objective: 
To 
formalize 
the 
NL 
Competency 
Questions.
Output: A set of Competency Questions formalize in 
an ontology query language.
(This task is optional, but recommended)
Formalized CQs will be used for evaluating (semi)-
automatically the ontology against the requirements.
